text:
Masalah nya sekarang adik kecil seojun malah bangun hanya karna pemandangan yg dia lihat.
"Cukupp,aku sudah tidak tahan, masa bodoh kedepannya "(batin seojun)
Tanpa pikir panjang seojun menarik tengkuk suho, lalu mencium nya.
" Ehhmmm... "(Desah suho tertahan dalam ciuman seojun)
Seojun melumat bibir suho, memasukkan lidah nya ke dalam mulut suho, mengeksplor seluruh isi mulut nya dengan lidah nya, terlihat suho pun membalas ciuman seojun tak kalah nafsu nya, suho meremat rambut seojun dengan kuat, memperdalam ciuman mereka.
Seakn kehabisan napas suho memukul dada seojun agar berhenti, akhirnya seojun pun beralih ke leher suho, mencium, mengisap, dan mengigit leher suho, mungkin besok banyak bercak merah yg akn terlihat dari leher nya,
trans:
The problem now was that Seojun's little brother woke up just because of the sight he saw.
"Enoughh,I can't take it anymore, I don't care about the consequences "(seojun thought to himself)
Without a second thought seojun grasped the suho's neck, then kissed him.
" Ehhmmm... "(suho's sigh is stifled by seojun's kiss)
Seojun pressed his lips against suho's, sliding his tongue into suho's mouth, exploring every corner of his mouth with his tongue, suho eagerly reciprocated seojun's kiss matching his passion, as he tangled his fingers firmly in seojun's hair deepening their kiss.
As if out of breath suho hit seojun's chest to signal him to stop, finally seojun shifted to suho's neck, kissing, sucking, and biting on suho's neck, perhaps by tomorrow there will be many red marks visible on his neck
